title: No quest for an Epic skin or Rune page rewards?
body: I didn't receive the quest for my rune pages today, any reason why? Maybe this was a mistake of some sort and I'm supposed to be receiving said quest? If possible could my refunds just be given back to me so i can refund the darn things haha. But in all seriousness i wish for this to be looked into as soon as possible (Yes ive looked into my purchase history and i do not see anything out of the ordinary)

replies.body: Hey I checked this out for you and do see that the account retrieve the converted BE.  Let me know if this is still an issue.

I only got one mission for one  Epic skin, even though i had 10 runepages. Did I miss something ? Or why didnt I get 3 Skins like everybody else ? (I looked through the purchase history, and I didnt get any)

Rune pages purchased with RP before September 1 would be eligible towards the mystery skin.  Any IP purchased rune pages would go towards Blue Essence, and not the skin.  In this case, your specific account was eligible for 1 skin.
